items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Development

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes

items.title: Awesome Salesforce
items.content_text:
### Troubleshooting and queries / Technical Blogs

*   [WIPDeveloper.com](https://wipdeveloper.com/) - WIPDevloper.com is where content created by Brett Nelson exploring areas of development in the Salesforce ecosystem is hosted.

### Troubleshooting and queries / Podcasts

*   [Code Coverage](https://www.codecoverage.org/) - Code Coverage is a podcast for developers on the force.com platform, in each episode we talk to a developer about how they got involved with the platform, what they’re working on, technologies they like and what they consider to be their most ‘creative’ solution.
items.content_html:
Troubleshooting and queries / Technical Blogs

  • WIPDeveloper.com - WIPDevloper.com is where content created by Brett Nelson exploring areas of development in the Salesforce ecosystem is hosted.

Troubleshooting and queries / Podcasts

  • Code Coverage - Code Coverage is a podcast for developers on the force.com platform, in each episode we talk to a developer about how they got involved with the platform, what they’re working on, technologies they like and what they consider to be their most ‘creative’ solution.

items.title: Awesome Digital History
items.content_text:
### Archives and primary sources / Switzerland

*   [Diplomatic Documents of Switzerland](https://www.dodis.ch/) - Diplomatic documents of Switzerland.
*   [HSSO](https://hsso.ch/) - Historical statistics of Switzerland online.

### Learning / Switzerland

*   [AdFontes](https://www.adfontes.uzh.ch/) - An Introduction to Working with Sources in the Archive.
*   [Clio Guide](https://guides.clio-online.de/) - A handbook on digital resources for the historical sciences.
items.content_html:
Archives and primary sources / Switzerland

  • Diplomatic Documents of Switzerland - Diplomatic documents of Switzerland.
  • HSSO - Historical statistics of Switzerland online.

Learning / Switzerland

  • AdFontes - An Introduction to Working with Sources in the Archive.
  • Clio Guide - A handbook on digital resources for the historical sciences.

items.title: Awesome Clean Tech
items.content_text:
### Companies / Vegetation & Agriculture

*   [Bowery Farming](https://boweryfarming.com) | New York, USA | 2015

    Their indoor vertical farms grow produce locally within cities with 95% less water, no pesticides, and 100x more productivity on the same footprint of land compared to traditional agriculture.
items.content_html:
Companies / Vegetation & Agriculture

  • Bowery Farming | New York, USA | 2015

    Their indoor vertical farms grow produce locally within cities with 95% less water, no pesticides, and 100x more productivity on the same footprint of land compared to traditional agriculture.

items.title: Awesome Nlg
items.content_text:
### Grammar

*   [OpenCCG (⭐211)](https://github.com/OpenCCG/openccg) - OpenCCG library for parsing and realization with CCG.
*   [EasyCCG (⭐59)](https://github.com/mikelewis0/easyccg) - CCG: All combinators, common grammar format, parsing to logical form, parameter estimation for probabilistic CCG.

### Realizers

*   [SimpleNLG (⭐818)](https://github.com/simplenlg/simplenlg) - Java API for Natural Language Generation.
*   [SimpleNLG DE (⭐18)](https://github.com/sebischair/SimpleNLG-DE) - German version of SimpleNLG 4.
items.content_html:
Grammar

  • OpenCCG (⭐211) - OpenCCG library for parsing and realization with CCG.
  • EasyCCG (⭐59) - CCG: All combinators, common grammar format, parsing to logical form, parameter estimation for probabilistic CCG.

Realizers

  • SimpleNLG (⭐818) - Java API for Natural Language Generation.
  • SimpleNLG DE (⭐18) - German version of SimpleNLG 4.

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Utilities / Productivity

*   [1440 Minutes Left Today](https://1440app.com/) - Keep a track of how many minutes you have left until the day is over, right in your menu bar. ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware") [![App Store](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-app-store.svg "App Store Software")](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/1440/id1483764819)
items.content_html:
Utilities / Productivity

  • 1440 Minutes Left Today - Keep a track of how many minutes you have left until the day is over, right in your menu bar.
